attributes.action: call an immediate general election to justify his premiership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom is a democracy, whereby we elect our Prime Minister via a free and fair elective system. Gordon Brown was not elected, but appointed in an unfair and undemocratic way. Therefore an election must be called immediately to justify his premiership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
